summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 16, H. E. Nelson Addition, et al., being the alley between 24th Avenue Northwest and 25th Avenue Northwest, from West 77th Street to West 80th Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15568 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
